popover.primary: A mastery path focused on immediate, direct effects
A mastery path focused on longer-duration effects
A mastery path focused on wide-area effects

data.name: Aethyric Shock
data.description: Overwhelms your opponent with power, inflicting 284 damage and Staggers the target for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.
data.rawDescription: Overwhelms your opponent with power, inflicting {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and Staggers the target for up to {ABIL_3027_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 1464 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects all groupmates within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for {ABIL_3884_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {ABIL_3884_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, and they will deal {ABIL_3876_COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {ABIL_3876_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.
data.rawDescription: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for {ABIL_3595_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Elemental damage over {ABIL_3595_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Blessing of Chaos
data.description: Critical heals will Bless your target for 10 seconds, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.
data.rawDescription: Critical heals will Bless your target for {ABIL_3777_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.

data.name: Boon of Tzeentch
data.description: Drains 310 health from your target, funneling 150% of the amount drained into your defensive target.
data.rawDescription: Drains {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} from your target, funneling 150% of the amount drained into your defensive target.

data.name: Breath of Tzeentch
data.description: All opponents within 30 feet of you are knocked back, and monsters are knocked down for 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All opponents within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you are knocked back, and monsters are knocked down for 3 seconds.

data.name: By Tzeentch's Will!
data.description: Critical direct heals will increase your morale by 200. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Critical direct heals will increase your morale by {COM_1_VAL0}. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Changer's Touch
data.description: Critical single target attacks place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 50% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Critical single target attacks place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 50% for {ABIL_3075_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Chaotic Agitation
data.description: You channel dark forces into your target and all targets within 30 feet of them, dealing 225 every 2 seconds for up to 6 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You channel dark forces into your target and all targets within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them, dealing {COM_1_VAL0} every 2 seconds for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Chaotic Blur
data.description: Detaunts targets attack power to 50% for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: Detaunts targets attack power to {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Chaotic Force
data.description: The Critical chance on Tzeentch's Cry, Scourge and Flash of Chaos is raised by 15%.
data.rawDescription: The Critical chance on Tzeentch's Cry, Scourge and Flash of Chaos is raised by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Daemonic Fortitude
data.description: Increases target's Wounds by 100 for 60 seconds and then heals the recipient for the amount increased.
data.rawDescription: Increases target's Wounds by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and then heals the recipient for the amount increased.

data.name: Dark Medicine
data.description: Restores 258 health to an ally, and then restores an additional 315 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.
data.rawDescription: Restores {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to an ally, and then restores an additional {ABIL_3554_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3554_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Demon Spittle
data.description: Spews a vile mixture over everything 40 feet in front of you, dealing 456 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds to all opponents.
data.rawDescription: Spews a vile mixture over everything {COM_0_RADI_FEET} in front of you, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to all opponents.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Willpower by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.
data.rawDescription: A strong heal that will restore {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage, but all of your casted heals become {COM_1_VAL1}% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.
data.rawDescription: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} from melee abilities.

data.name: Drink Deeply
data.description: Tzeentch's Cordial will now heal an additional 220 health after the effect ends.
data.rawDescription: Tzeentch's Cordial will now heal an additional {ABIL_8558_COM_1_VAL0_HEALTH} after the effect ends.

data.name: Dust of Pandemonium
data.description: All group members within 100 feet of you are healed for 643.
data.rawDescription: All group members within 100 feet of you are healed for {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Elixir Of Dark Blessings
data.description:
Heals your target for 883 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.
data.rawDescription:
Heals your target for {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Embrace the Warp
data.description: You embrace the Warp, surrounding yourself with its power. You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.
data.rawDescription: You embrace the Warp, surrounding yourself with its power. You will take only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage and your abilities will cost {COM_1_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Empowered Alteration
data.description: Leaping Alteration will also restore 48 Action Points over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Leaping Alteration will also restore {ABIL_3998_COM_1_VAL0_TOD_ACTIONPOINTS} over {ABIL_3998_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Endless Gifts
data.description: Cooldown on Glimpse of Chaos is reduced by 5s and the cost increased by 15 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Cooldown on Glimpse of Chaos is reduced by 5s and the cost increased by 15 Action Points.

data.name: Eye of Sheerian
data.description: Increase the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by 1320 and resists by 504 for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increase the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by {COM_0_VAL0} and resists by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Flash of Chaos
data.description: A burst of chaos that restores 276 health to an ally.
data.rawDescription: A burst of chaos that restores {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to an ally.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Glimpse of Chaos
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: You call upon the power of chaos, removing one Curse or Hex from your defensive target.
data.rawDescription: You call upon the power of chaos, removing one Curse or Hex from your defensive target.

data.name: Harbinger of Doom
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you are the Harbinger of Doom, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you are the Harbinger of Change, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.
data.rawDescription:
When this ability is toggled on, you are the Harbinger of Doom, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you are the Harbinger of Change, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.

data.name: Lashing Waves
data.description: Tzeentch's Lash will now strike all opponents within 20 feet of your initial target.
data.rawDescription: Tzeentch's Lash will now strike all opponents within {ABIL_8565_COM_2_RADI_FEET} of your initial target.

data.name: Leaping Alteration
data.description: A bolt of healing energy which instantly leaps to allies within 30 feet of the last affected, restoring 507 health over 9 seconds. This effect will only pass through each target once, and will affect up to 6 allies.
data.rawDescription: A bolt of healing energy which instantly leaps to allies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of the last affected, restoring {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. This effect will only pass through each target once, and will affect up to 6 allies.

data.name: Manipulation
data.description: Any time you directly heal someone, there is a  25% chance your offensive target will take damage equal to 25% of the healed value.
data.rawDescription: Any time you directly heal someone, there is a  25% chance your offensive target will take damage equal to 25% of the healed value.

data.name: Mark of Daemonic Fury
data.description:
Increases a groupmember's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by 50. The bearer of this Mark may also activate it like an ability to inflict 234 Corporeal damage.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
Increases a groupmember's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by {COM_0_VAL0}. The bearer of this Mark may also activate it like an ability to inflict {ABIL_3611_COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE}.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of Remaking
data.description:
The groupmember bearing this Mark can resurrect themselves if killed in the next 10 minutes. In addition, the bearer's Toughness is increased by 80 for 1 hour.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
The groupmember bearing this Mark can resurrect themselves if killed in the next 10 minutes. In addition, the bearer's Toughness is increased by {COM_5_VAL0} for 1 hour.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of the Spell Destroyer
data.description:
Increases a groupmember's Initiative and Willpower by 50. The bearer of this Mark may activate it like an ability to inflict 552 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of the Vortex
data.description:
Increases all your groupmember's resistances by 157. The bearer of this Mark may activate it to inflict 342 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds to all targets within 30 feet.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.
data.rawDescription:

You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mirror of Madness

data.name: Ritual of Superiority
data.note: You may only have 1 Ritual active

data.name: Wind of Insanity
data.description:
You securely root yourself in place to call fourth ferocious winds for up to 6 seconds that inflict 172 damage every second to targets within 30 feet of you. The fierce winds will knock back players a short distance without granting them immunity, and will knock down monsters for 3 seconds. Targets cannot be knocked back more than once every 1.5 seconds.
This spell may be toggled off to regain your movement.
data.rawDescription:
You securely root yourself in place to call fourth ferocious winds for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that inflict {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second to targets within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of you. The fierce winds will knock back players a short distance without granting them immunity, and will knock down monsters for 3 seconds. Targets cannot be knocked back more than once every 1.5 seconds.
This spell may be toggled off to regain your movement.

data.description: Inflicts 1200 damage to all targets within 30 feet of you, making heals 50% less effective on them for 10 seconds. This ability hits max 9 targets.
